BuildMonument_TimeProtect.questDescripti.li:
commonEnding->The monument is [monumentSize] in size and will require these resources (total value [monumentRequiredResourcesMarketValue_money]):

[monumentRequiredResources]

Construction must be completed within [constructionTimeoutTicks_duration] of accepting the task.

After completion, you'll have to protect the monument for [haveToProtectForTicks_duration]. [asker2] will be upset if you abandon it during this time. If any piece of it is destroyed, [asker2]'s enforcement system will activate and [threatDescription]

You'll receive the rewards when you finish construction.

LanguageData.BuildMonument_TimeProtect.LetterTextMonu: Ви завершили будівництво монумента.\n\nТепер ви повинні захищати його протягом [haveToProtectForTicks_duration]. Якщо будь-яку його частину буде знищено, [asker2] активує механізм помсти, і [threatDescription]
